game.name: Tomato Jones - Episode 3
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tomato Jones - Episode 3 is a physics-based ball-rolling platformer and the exciting third installment in the fun-filled series, following Tomato Jones and Tomato Jones 2, both already available on Steam.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tomato Jones - Episode 3 is a physics-based ball-rolling platformer and the exciting third installment in the fun-filled series, following Tomato Jones and Tomato Jones 2, both already available on Steam.

reviewHighlights.text: 제발 하지마 제발 만들지마 제발 사지마
